siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, If you’re sick of milkshake talk skip the first 3.5 minutes. From there we rejoice in our first iTunes written review AND the first great mystery of Life with a Twist of Lemon. Jon used the Meat Rubs by Fenker that he received in the mail and gives his review. Bad…

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We have a sweeter Lemon join us at the beginning of this episode. Lucy tells us about her milkshake experience which leads into even more milkshake talk. Surprisingly they had very similar milkshakes. Those of you in the Indianapolis area should check out…

frontmatter.title: Episode 10 - What to look for when looking at Houses (Top 10!)

node.excerpt: Dear Listener who may in fact be sick of hearing us talk about milkshakes, This week we talk about Milkshakes! Stan’s Portillo’s milkshake to be exact. He had an interesting experience. He tells it better than I do. But this picture is referenced… Stan's portillo's milkshake…
